_header: After winter the vere with foils green
_description: Mistrust me not, Mistress — three 8-line stanzas and 4-line Envoy (associated with Charles d’Orléans)

BLHar682.First Lines:
Afftir wyntir the veer with foylis greneAftir the sterry nyght the
                    morow gray…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…As thei say whiche make more fresshe arayThe chaunge of yowre
                    mystrust if y myght se
